Package com.example.AceHardwareStore.controllers

Class EmployeeController

java.lang.Object
com.example.AceHardwareStore.controllers.EmployeeController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/employee") public class EmployeeController extends Object
Handles REST request to /employee/*

      @PreAuthorize("isAuthenticated()") @GetMapping("") public List<Employee> listEmployees(@RequestParam(required=false) String departmentId, Principal principal)
      Returns a list of all employees
      Parameters:
      departmentId - Optional id to constrain which employees are returned
      Returns:
      The list of employees

      Parameters:

    • addEmployee

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\')") @ResponseStatus(CREATED) @PostMapping("") public Employee addEmployee(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid Employee employee)
      Adds a new employee
      Parameters:
      employee - The employee to add
      Returns:
      The added employee

    • updateEmployee

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\')") @ResponseStatus(OK) @PutMapping("/{id}") public Employee updateEmployee(@PathVariable int id, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid Employee employee)
      Updates an employee's details and returns the updated employee
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the employee to update
      employee - The updated Employee object
      Returns:
      The updated employee

    • updateEmployeePhoneNumber

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\')") @ResponseStatus(OK) @PatchMapping("/{id}/phone_number") public Employee updateEmployeePhoneNumber(@PathVariable int id, @RequestBody String phoneNumber)
      Updates an employee's phone number and returns updated employee
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the employee to update
      phoneNumber - The updated phone number
      Returns:
      The updated employee

    • updateEmployeeHourlyRate

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\')") @ResponseStatus(OK) @PatchMapping("/{id}/hourly_rate") public Employee updateEmployeeHourlyRate(@PathVariable int id, @RequestBody BigDecimal hourlyRate)
      Updates an employee's hourly rate and returns updated employee
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the employee to update
      hourlyRate - The updated employee's hourly rate
      Returns:
      The updated employee

    • deleteEmployee

      @PreAuthorize("hasAuthority(\'ADMIN\')") @ResponseStatus(NO_CONTENT) @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public void deleteEmployee(@PathVariable int id)
      Deletes an employee
      Parameters:
      id - Id of an employee to be deleted
